properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the XMLInstruction.

methods.name: add

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: A name that identifies the processing instruction to an application reading the exported XML file.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: A value that tells the application what to do with the processing instruction identified in the target. (Optional)

parameters.name: storyOffset
parameters.description: The location within the story, specified as an insertion point. Can accept: InsertionPoint or Long Integer. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new XMLInstruction (Optional)

methods.description: Creates a new XML processing instruction.

methods.name: item

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.description: Returns the XMLInstruction with the specified index or name.

methods.name: itemByID
methods.description: Returns the XMLInstruction with the specified ID.

methods.name: itemByRange

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The XMLInstruction, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: XMLInstruction, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The XMLInstruction, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: XMLInstruction, Long Integer or String.

methods.description: Returns the XMLInstructions within the specified range.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first XMLInstruction in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last XMLInstruction in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle XMLInstruction in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the XMLInstruction that follows the desired XMLInstruction.

methods.description: Returns the XMLInstruction with the index previous to the specified index.

methods.name: nextItem

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The XMLInstruction whose index comes before the desired XMLInstruction.

methods.description: Returns the XMLInstruction whose index follows the specified XMLInstruction in the collection.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any XMLInstruction in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every XMLInstruction in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the XMLInstruction.
Returns the XMLInstruction with the specified index.
